thread.title: Rishi Arneja
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Rishi Arneja

author: Rishi Arneja
title: Rishi Arneja
text: Right from start to finish all arrangements made were excellent , selection of hotels , their locations and service were great . Rental care arrangement was very convenient, pick up and drop off location very close to hotels . Our travel agent jenn Browne made seamless arrangements.New Zealand is an amazing place to visit with both islands having unique beauty. We loved everything about our trip
